mutants.code:
def is_anagram(s, t):
    s = s.lower()
    t = t.lower()
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum()))
    t = ''.join((e for e in t if e.isalnum()))
    s = sorted(s)
    t = sorted(t)
    return s != t

    t = ''.join((e for e in t if e.isalnum()))

mutants.code:
def is_anagram(s, t):
    s = s.lower()
    t = t.lower()
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum()))
    t = 'MUTATED'.join((e for e in t if e.isalnum()))
    s = sorted(s)
    t = sorted(t)
    return s == t
